Description.Text:
Hotel Hacienda Guachipelín is located in Guanacaste, 8 km outside of Liberia, Costa Rica and 17 km from Rincón de la Vieja Volcano National Park. The hacienda is dedicated to ecotourism and surrounded by lush gardens full of native trees, exotic flowers and a great variety of birds. The property offers amazing views of the volcano and the Pacific.
Our rooms radiate a sophisticated, homey style. They feature a safe deposit box and either air-conditioning or a fan. Solar panels furnish the hot water in your private bathroom.
Sample some of the area's best food at our restaurant. You will relish a panoramic view. Natural spring water from the volcano makes our swimming pool especially refreshing. At night-time, listen and dance to live marimba music in our bar. Our rooms radiate a sophisticated, homey style, and offer views of the volcano and the hacienda. The sounds of nature will lull you to sleep at night-time. Rooms feature a safe deposit box and either air- conditioning or a fan. Solar panels furnish the hot water in your private bathroom. Sample some of the area's best food at our restaurant. You will relish a gorgeous views of the Guanacaste lowlands, the city of Liberia, the Pacific coastline and the hacienda. Natural spring water from the volcano makes our swimming pool especially refreshing. Simbiosis Spa is nestled into the tropical dry forest and can be reached either on horseback or with a driver organized by the hotel. The treatment starts with a natural sauna before applying volcanic mud to your body. After a final chill-out in the thermal sulphur waters, you will feel like a new person. Enhance this feeling indulging into one of the many massages on offer. Guests enjoy unlimited access to the Río Negro Hot Springs, which lie 3 km into the property of Hacienda Guachipelín. Six thermal pools are constantly filled with new water from the volcanic hot springs. Enjoy a healthy, relaxing bath in the midst of lush forest.
Extremely popular Rincon de la Vieja Volcano National Park is easily reachable all year round and located just over an hour away from Papagayo, Tamarindo and Potrero, a few awesome Guanacaste beaches. The park is teeming with rich wildlife and plant life. Different trails allow you to discover over 200 bird species, 3 different kinds of monkeys as well as various reptiles and mammals.
Its two volcanoes – the Rincon de la Vieja and the Santa Maria – are abundant with secondary volcanic activity, including fumaroles, vapor vents, sulphur vents, boiling mud pots, roaring little craters, fumarolic lagoons and waterfalls that create peaceful, blue lagoons.
During your stay, you can admire the hacienda's vaqueros (cowboys) at work and you can even become a cowboy for a day ! For those looking for a different holiday, the surrounding area provides perfect terrain for horseback riding, canopy and tubing tours on Río Negro, mountain biking as well as trekking. Among other attractions you will find hiking trails; natural hot water springs; relaxing volcanic mud pools; rivers; crystal clear waterfalls as well as virgin forests with birds, mammals, reptiles and insects.
